E C. Babcock N FOOREA Deputy Treasurer Bookkeeper Miss Laura B. Taylor Bookkeeper

REPORT. State of Nebraska, Treasury Department. ) Lincoln, December 1, 1906. ) Sir: I have the honor to lay before you, as required by Article S. Section 22, of the Constitution, a detailed statement of the transactions of this department dnring the biennial period, and an account of the condi- tion of the state treasury at the close tion of the state treasury at the close of business on the 30th day of Novem- of business on the 30th day of Novem - $ 336.853.62 ber, 1906. ber, 1906. Balance December 1, 1904 Balance December 1. 1904 $ 336.853.62 Receipts from December 1, 1904. to Receipts from December 1. 1904. to November November 30. 1906, inclusive 10,551,784.24 $10,888,637.86 Disbursements December 1. 1904. to November 30, 1906. inclusive 10,556,737.41 Balance on hand November 30, 1906 $ 331,900 4S TBIST FINDS 1NV Permanent School Fund $ 6.787,243 80 Permanent University Fund 166,060.00 Agricultural College Endowment Fund . 433471.31 Normal Endowment Fund 71,941 46 $ 7,458.716.57 Bonds and coupons $ 5,639,628.99 General and University Fund Warrants 1,819,087.58 7,458,716 57 For further details. I respectfully refer you to tables making up the remainder of this report. Respectfully submitted. 'in Hi.- >i. .Inlni II. Mickey, <*"■
